attributes.action: advise the Sovereign that it would be inappropriate for the death of Baroness Thatcher to be recognised with a State Funeral.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The award of a State Funeral to a politician as divisive and widely despised as Margaret Thatcher would debase such a ceremony, which should act as a focus for stimulating national unity and community feeling.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
